name: Little Sadie
text: On Play DON!! -1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): If your Leader has the {Impel Down} type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.
conditions: your Leader has the {Impel Down} type
